contexts.context: ...Paulus erzählte mir das, und sagte, er konnte alle <mark>Instrumente</mark>. Er wohnte dort, wo jetzt der Konviktsdirektor sein...
...told me this and said he could play every <mark>instrument</mark>. He lived where the Director of Students now...
Anonymus 077 and 078 prepared bifolios with <mark>instrument</mark> names, clefs, time and key signatures and...
..., Nos. 1 and 2 prepared bifolio with <mark>instrument</mark> names, clefs and sometimes key Library Call Numbers...
...with Leopold Hofmeyr, he also prepared bifolios with <mark>instrument</mark> names and bar lines, leaving the measures empty...
Anonymus 077 and 078 prepared bifolios with <mark>instrument</mark> names, clefs, time and key signatures and...
...Ten 1; 11 Ten 2; 11 Bass 1; all <mark>instrumental</mark> parts except hn 1–4[1]
